text: For behind all imperialism is ultimately the imperialistic individual, just as behind all peace is ultimately the peaceful individual.
author: Irving Babbitt

text: To attain inner peace you must actually give your life, not just your possessions. When you at last give your life - bringing into alignment your beliefs and the way you live then, and only then, can you begin to find inner peace.
author: Peace Pilgrim

text: Peace is rarely denied to the peaceful.
author: Friedrich Schiller

text: People always make war when they say they love peace.
author: David Herbert Lawrence

text: The forces that are driving mankind toward unity and peace are deep-seated and powerful. They are material and natural, as well as moral and intellectual.
author: Arthur Henderson
